DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Conventional Flexible Extended Oral Contraceptive EE/DRSP With Without Metafolin Latin America
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteer 18 35 year age ( smoker 30 year , inclusive ) request contraceptive protection Pregnancy lactation ( le 3 month since delivery , abortion , lactation start treatment ) Body mass index ( BMI ) > /= 30.0 kg/m2 Presence history venous arterial thrombotic/thromboembolic event Repeated measurement systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Presence history liver tumor ( benign malignant ) , severe hepatic disease , jaundice and/or pruritus related cholestasis , cholestatic jaundice associate pregnancy previous combine oral contraceptive ( COC ) use Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus and/or diabetes mellitus vascular involvement Severe dyslipoproteinemia Malignant premalignant disease Uncontrolled thyroid disorder Chronic inflammatory bowel disease
